high_descs: Turn to the right, face the brown desk near the lamp
Pick up the pen from the desk
Turn to the right, walk forward, then turn to the left
anns.task_desc: Pick up the pen from the desk and turn on the light.

high_descs: Move to the right side of the desk
Pick up the blue pencil on the desk
Move to the right side of the desk
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pencil and examine it by the light of a lamp

high_descs: Turn right to go to the desk on the right
Go to the lamp on the right edge of the desk
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pen and turn on a lamp
